questionCopy: Is the lobby welcoming for residents and guests?
Do the residents seem to be happy?  Talk with some of them.
Do the residents look neat and clean and well taken care of?
Does the population appear to resemble what you are looking for?
Do you have Concierge Service?
Are there bathrooms conveniently located in the common areas?
Do you have a nice, outside sitting area?
Do you have a nice seating area in the lobby?
What is the ratio of men to women?
Do you see an Ombudsman poster?
Are the Administrative offices accessible to the residents and families?
Is the Nurse's station accessible to the residents and families?
Do you have a move-in coordinator to assist with the move?
Do other agencies come in to the facility?
What is the facility policy regarding solicitation?
Is there a resident curfew?
Does your community have a guest room for out-of-town guests?
Do you see a community phone for resident use?
Can residents bring their car?
Do you have assigned parking?
Is the resident parking area covered?
Do you have a facility pet?
Do you have an activity room?
Do you have a swimming pool?
Do you have a library?
Do you have a fitness center?
Do you have a computer room?
Do you have a theater?
Do you have a coffee shop?
Is there a pleasant odor in the dining room?
xIs the menu posted in the dining room?
Do you provide mail boxes for the resieents?
How does a resident send out mail?
Do you have a model room that I can see?
Does your building have cat walks?
Does a resident have to go outside to get to the common areas?
Are the halls free of obstacles?
Are the exits free of obstacles and easy to reach?
Are the halls well lighted?
Are the floors slippery?
Is the carpet safe for wheelchair and walker use?
Are the fire extinguishers visible?
Is there a designated area for smkoking?
Do you have smoke detectors in residents' rooms as well as the common areas?
Do you have surveillance cameras inside your community?
Do you have surveillance cameras outside your community?
Is your main enterance supervised at all times?
Are there enough elevators to accommodate the number of residents?
Do the doors to the elevator open and close properly?
Are the inspections up to date and posted inside the elevators?
Does your facility have hurricane shutters?
Does your facility have a generator?
